description: A Supreme Court inquiry aims to find out if the king received any undeclared payments.
title: Spain ex-king Juan Carlos probed over Saudi rail deal
title_page: Spain ex-king Juan Carlos probed over Saudi rail deal - BBC News
maintext: The court prosecutor's office says it aims to establish the ex-king's connection with the project after his abdication in June 2014. At that point he lost his immunity from prosecution.
